players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob, accusing Charlie so quickly without discussion seems rushed. We should hear Charlie out before deciding."
Diana: "Let's give Charlie a chance to explain himself before we make any decisions. Rushing to vote without hearing all sides could lead us astray."
You: "Charlie has stayed silent twice now despite the serious accusation. Silence can be telling—it's time to vote him out before he harms more of the town."
